description:
Yushi is adapting well to his new life at the apartment, particularly with the help of pretty young transfer student Akine.  But he finds that he`s deeper in the world of Yokai than he ever imagines when a classmate is injured in an accident...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les occupants du foyer des esprits
The Residents of the Yokai Apartments
妖怪アパートの住人たち
